about.details:
Incorporated in 1996, Marvel Decor Limited designs, manufactures, and sells a range of window covering products under the Marvel brand name in India and internationally. They offers roller, roman, vertical, bamboo, wooden venetian, luzon, grayson, eton, patricia, aric, colby, meliso, dorren, and sierra blinds; and curtain rods, and automation products and tracks.

They are producing about 810 components of different type, size and colors as per customer requirement. They make 14 types of blinds and more than 900+ shades. One of their manufacturing unit is in Dared, Jamnagar, Gujarat where they manufacture readymade venetian blinds specially for Reliance Refineries and Roller blinds, Bamboo, Vertical and Wooden Venetian blinds supplying to the furnishing stores. In their second manufacturing unit they manufacture Roller, Roman, Luzon and Vertical blinds.

Marvel has marked its presence nationwide having 338 galleries, in 224 cities of 24 states.

faqs.question: What is the Marvel Decor IPO?
faqs.answer:
Marvel Decor IPO is a SME IPO of 4616000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹26.26 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹57 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 12, 2018, and closes on March 15, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Marvel Decor IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Marvel Decor IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Marvel Decor IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Marvel Decor IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Marvel Decor IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Marvel Decor IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Marvel Decor IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
